summary: A Slavonic Mass by Leos Janácek plays as historical figures, biblical characters, and mythical creatures gather in the pleasure dome. Aphrodite, Lilith, Isis, Kali, Astarte, Nero, Pan, and ... See full summary »
cast: Samson De Brier|Marjorie Cameron|Joan Whitney|Katy Kadell|Renate Druks|Anaïs Nin|Paul Mathison|Curtis Harrington|Kenneth Anger|Peter Loome
title: Inauguration of the Pleasure Dome
